name: 1000ml Tin PVC Solvent
description: Strong and reliable 1000ml PVC solvent cement, ideal for securely bonding PVC pipes and fittings.

details.overview: This 1000ml Tin PVC Solvent by Milan Flow is specially formulated to create strong, long-lasting joints for PVC pipes and fittings. It ensures a leak-proof bond suitable for household, agricultural, and industrial plumbing systems.
features: Fast-setting formula for quick and efficient installation
applications: Construction and maintenance of drainage systems

name: 118ml Tin CPVC Solvent
description: High-strength 500ml CPVC solvent cement designed for hot and cold water applications, ensuring durable leak-proof joints.

details.overview: This 500ml Tin CPVC Solvent by Milan Flow is specially formulated for CPVC pipes and fittings, providing heat-resistant, long-lasting joints. Ideal for hot and cold water plumbing in both residential and industrial systems.
features: Heat-resistant formulation suitable for hot water applications
Ensures strong, durable, and leak-proof joints
High bonding strength with CPVC pipes and fittings
applications: Hot and cold water plumbing systems
Residential and commercial water supply lines
Industrial fluid handling with higher temperature tolerance
Repair and maintenance of CPVC pipelines
